name: PublishCodeCoverageResults
description: Publish code coverage results to VSTS/TFS
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: codeCoverageTool
inputs.label: Code Coverage Tool
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the tool with which code coverage summary files have been generated

inputs.name: summaryFileLocation
inputs.label: Summary File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of code coverage summary file, which has code coverage statistics like line, method, class coverage. For example, $(Build.Repository.LocalPath)\CodeCoverage\Summary.xml

inputs.name: reportDirectory
inputs.label: Report Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of code coverage report directory. The report directory is published as an artifact against the build. For example, $(Build.Repository.LocalPath)\CodeCoverageReport

inputs.name: additionalCodeCoverageFiles
inputs.label: Additional Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression specifying the additional code coverage files to be published as an artifact against the build. For example, `$(Build.Repository.LocalPath)\**\*.exec`
